column1: We are so glad to have you and your dedication to the company in this position.
There have been a few incidents of virus activity in this sector.
As you might expect we take risks such as this very seriously.
It calms my old nerves that a competent worker has been placed here.
You’re the sort to tell me of any odd activities, yes? Of course you are.|BEXOS|10
I do hold quite a bit of power here. You would be well off, telling me anything noteworthy now.|BEXOS|10
